settings.bannerDesciption-2: Show Off Your Double Dots With Wheels To Suit Your Life. With Fabulous Features.

settings.activitytext: As the inventors of the world's first modular stroller, we are pioneers in our industry, setting the standards and trends for the rest to follow.
Keep your child out of the sun and wind with the adjustable canopy with a peek-a-boo window and covered sunroof
Our engineers apply innovative thinking, well thought-through design and vast years of experience to ensure exceptional performance.
Safety and Security Our engineers apply innovative thinking, well thought-through design and vast years of experience to ensure exceptional performance.

settings.ListText1: Height adjustable to raise your baby higher for interaction
Suitable from newborn with optional Stokke Xplory Carry Bassinet
3 parent- and 2 forward-facing stroller seating positions

settings.header-left1: Height adjustable - To bring your baby closer to you
settings.description-left1: Stokke's signature height adjustable baby stroller

settings.Rightptextid2: Perfect Themes and the best of all that you have many options to choose! Best Support team ever!Very fast responding and experts on their fields! Thank you very much! ..
Code, template and others are very good. The support has served me immediately and solved my problems when I need help. Are to be congratulated. Att Renan Andrade ..
